DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether nivolumab is safe and effective in the treatment of advanced or recurrent solid tumors in Chinese subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Nivolumab in Chinese Subjects With Previously Treated Advanced or Recurrent Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Chinese subjects with advanced or recurrent solid tumors Subjects with brain metastases are excluded unless clinically stable for more than 2 weeks at the time of enrollment as determined by the investigator Subjects with carcinomatous meningitis are excluded
